subject: Selenium + JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi there, Our Project Manager told us to use Selenium in creating our testing scripts for our applications. He mentioned about JUNIT. He told us to study on
messageBody:
Hi there,

Our Project Manager told us to use Selenium in creating our testing
scripts for our applications. He mentioned about JUNIT. He told us to
study on how to combine Selenium and JUNIT. May I know some good
references on where to find them.

Also, may I know how to use the following Selenium test scripts
(basic) that I created in JUNIT:

<html>
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
<title>001 - 01 - Maintain Appointments-Add</title>
</head>
<body>
<table cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" border="1">
<thead>
<tr><td rowspan="1" colspan="3">001 - 01 - Maintain Appointments-
Add</td></tr>
</thead><tbody>
<tr>
<td>open</td>
<td>/</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>type</td>
<td>sc-login:username:display</td>
<td>admin</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>type</td>
<td>sc-login:password:display</td>
<td>admin</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>clickAndWait</td>
<td>link=Login</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>clickAndWait</td>
<td>sc-main-menu:table-link:div</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr&g t;
<td>clickAndWait</td>
<td>sc-table-maintain:link-appointment:div</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>clickAndWait</td>
<td>link=Add</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>assertElementPresent</td>
<td>sc-appointment-type-maintain:grid-1:edit:0</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>verifyText</td>
<td>//div[@id='sc-appointment-type-maintain:grid-
1:div']/div/div/table/tbody/tr[228]/td</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>type</td>
<td>sc-appointment-type-maintain:grid-1:edit:0</td>
<td>XRAYS EYES</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>clickAndWait</td>
<td>link=Save</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
</body>
</html>

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Jojo
